info.name: Android Application
info.description:
The Android Application API collection provides endpoints for managing the core functionalities of the LMS mobile app on Android.

This includes secure video playback, user authentication, access control, push notifications, and data synchronization.

The APIs ensure optimal performance and security, leveraging native Android features and technologies such as Kotlin, ExoPlayer, EncryptedSharedPreferences, and Firebase Cloud Messaging (FCM).
